subject: Baseball
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: On a day Mariano Rivera became the 15th player to pitch in 1,000 career games, the Yankees learned the setup man Rafael Soriano will miss the next six to eight weeks with an inflamed ligament in his elbow.
snippet: On a day Mariano Rivera became the 15th player to pitch in 1,000 career games, the Yankees learned the setup man Rafael Soriano will miss the next six to eight weeks with an inflamed ligament in his elbow.
